body_html: @agniszczotka It’s definitely possible to reach higher utilization, so it would be good to understand what the problem is here. One possibility is that the Dataset pipeline can prefetch and preprocess data more aggressively than the older API, which in some configurations can lead to oversubscription of the CPU, and thereby delay the dispatch of work to the GPU. Please open a new issue with a description of the program you’re running, and we’ll take a look.

body: @agniszczotka It’s definitely possible to reach higher utilization, so it would be good to understand what the problem is here. One possibility is that the `Dataset` pipeline can prefetch and preprocess data more aggressively than the older API, which in some configurations can lead to oversubscription of the CPU, and thereby delay the dispatch of work to the GPU. Please open a new issue with a description of the program you’re running, and we’ll take a look.
